question: Will $ENS (Ethereum Name Service) be above $50 on November 25?
description:
This is a market on whether the candlestick close price of Ethereum Name Service $ENS will be above $50.00 for the date and time of November 25, 2021, at 11:30 PM ET. 

The resolution source for this market will be prices listed on CoinGecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/ethereum-name-service). 

This market will resolve to “Yes” if, according to the resolution source, $ENS has a candlestick closing price of greater than $50.00 for the resolution date, November 25, 2021, 11:30 PM ET after 11:30 PM ET has passed. 
Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”. 

(To see the candlestick close price, click the candlestick icon, observe the number after the “C:” when you hover over a candlestick for a given time period.)

This market will resolve on the “C” (i.e. closing price) listed for the candle titled “Thu 25 November 2021, 23:30:00” with the “Price” tab selected, in the Eastern Time Zone. Note, this 23:30:00 candle lists the opening price for 11:00:00 PM ET and the closing price for 11:30:00 PM ET. To allow for updates, this market will resolve on the number listed for the referenced candle at exactly 11:50:00 PM ET, on November 25, 2021. 

Note: If the candlestick closing price is exactly $50.00, the market will resolve "No." 

If CoinGecko is unavailable at resolution time, another source will be used.
